thread.title: Shy Varun And Violent Alia Bhatt Are A Delight In The Second Teaser Of Koffee With Karan - Indiatimes.com
thread.title_full: Shy Varun And Violent Alia Bhatt Are A Delight In The Second Teaser Of Koffee With Karan - Indiatimes.com

title: Shy Varun And Violent Alia Bhatt Are A Delight In The Second Teaser Of Koffee With Karan - Indiatimes.com
text:
Shy Varun And Violent Alia Bhatt Are A Delight In The Second Teaser Of Koffee With Karan 351 SHARES February 07, 2017 351 SHARES 
Farah Khan and Sania Mirza's Koffee With Karan episode wasn't funny at all and many claimed that it was quite boring. However, just to make sure that the viewers don't give up on Karan Johar's cup of 'Koffee', the teasers of the upcoming episode look like a perfect consolation prize. Once I made an edit & see how they slay!! @varundvn looks so cute on @aliaabhatt 's lap....& all those funny moments....can't really express my feelings...&&&...,I noticed the HAMPER beside Varun's seat this time oh gosh at last my baby boo got the HAMPER!! Yewww....I'm so happy now I need a party! 😂😂😂😂❤❤ but I still love u HAMPER se kea hoga pyaar kafi hai Baby Doll 😍😍😍😂❤❤❤ My RAJAA 👑👑👑 I love u #varia 😍😍 #koffeewithkaran A photo posted by 🚩 👑Varun KING Dhawan👑🚩™ (@varun_dvn_slays) on Feb 5, 2017 at 9:30pm PST 
Both Alia and Varun would be appearing for the second time this season to promote KJo's second in the Dulhania franchise, Badrinath ki Dulhania . The trailer of the film was released a few days ago and received a great response. And now, after an entertaining first teaser of the episode, the second trailer is just about perfect. جعلني النظرات الحلوة. 😿💕 .#varundhawan #aliaabhatt #koffeewithkaran #badrinathkidulhania #varia #valia #Bollywood 💞🌚👏❤😭🔥😪 A photo posted by اكاونتي القديم انسرق 💔 (@loubna.bolly) on Feb 6, 2017 at 5:39pm PST 
From a violent Alia Bhatt to a not so shy Varun Dhawan, the second teaser is funnier than the first one. Without any delay, watch the teaser right here. Don't Miss
